credits.value: Lenovo thanks Souhardya Sardar of Cyberstanc for reporting this issue.

description_data.value: A memory leakage vulnerability was reported in the 534D0140 DXE driver that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to write to NVRAM variables.

supportingMedia.value: Update system firmware to the version (or newer) indicated for your model in the advisory: https://support.lenovo.com/us/en/product_security/LEN-141775

solution.value: Update system firmware to the version (or newer) indicated for your model in the advisory:  https://support.lenovo.com/us/en/product_security/LEN-141775

description_data.value: A memory leakage vulnerability was reported in the 534D0140 DXE driver that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to write to NVRAM variables.
